definition: fried dough twist (crisp snack food made by deep-frying plaited dough)/worn out or worn smooth (of clothes)
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Drill cross section profile(DCSP) is a characteristic parameter of drill helix flute form.
sentences.chinese: 橫向截形是麻花鑽螺旋麪容屑槽的一個特徵參數。

sentences.english: Tianjin's specialties are battercake, twist dessert.
sentences.chinese: 天津的特產是煎餅和麻花。

sentences.english: The Twisted Headbands favor people who want hair out of their face and it also works on curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 麻花頭帶適合希望頭髮不要遮住臉的人，也適合捲髮。

sentences.english: Allow the braided dough to rise one last time upon a baking sheet until it is the desired size.
sentences.chinese: 允許辮成麻花狀的麪糰發酵脹起成爲希望的尺寸。

sentences.english: A couple of cute girls started talking to me, telling me how much they liked my dreads.
sentences.chinese: 兩個女孩跟我聊起來，說很喜歡我的麻花頭。

sentences.english: One can also shape the brioche into a braid for special occasions.
sentences.chinese: 你同樣可以在特殊場合下將奶油蛋卷做成麻花狀。

sentences.english: The dough-twist style plaits are a symbol of Uygur girls.
sentences.chinese: 麻花辮子幾乎是維吾爾族姑娘的象徵了。

sentences.english: Pull your hair back tight, stack two braids on top of your head.
sentences.chinese: 將頭髮向後拉緊，在發頂扎兩條麻花辮團成結。

sentences.english: The latest side braids are another amazing christmas hair trend.
sentences.chinese: 最新的側邊麻花辮又是聖誕節的一大流行髮式。

sentences.english: Let the braided hair hang loose on your collar.
sentences.chinese: 讓兩條麻花辮松垂在你的衣領前。

sentences.english: The sweet beautiful girl's thick string twist rebozo makes the cold winter warm.
sentences.chinese: 甜美女孩的粗線麻花長圍巾讓冬天也溫暖起來。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the morphological basis for identify exactly seeds of Gentiana macrophylla Pall, and Gentiana straminea Maxim.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲準確鑑別秦艽和麻花秦艽種子提供形態學依據。

sentences.english: The Honeydukes candy shop puts a magical twist on getting fat.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜公爵糖果店裏，一個麻花糖果正在神奇地變胖。

sentences.english: Can I please have the cinnamon twist?
sentences.chinese: 那我能喫這甜肉桂麻花了嗎？

definition: sugar-coated Chinese hawthorn or other fruit on a stick/tanghulu
glutinous rice and choice of filling wrapped in leaves and boiled
tanghulu/candied fruits on bamboo skewers dipped in sugar syrup, a common Chinese snack
jianbing, a savory Chinese crêpe/pancake/CL:張|张[zhang1]
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
